noun.description: The process of increasing the volume of sound, especially using an amplifier.
examples: even without amplification, her voice carries to the farthest corners

noun.description: The action of enlarging upon or adding detail to a story or statement.
examples: the words 'no real prospect of succeeding' do not need any amplification
thanks to all who wrote in with corrections and amplifications

noun.description: The action of making multiple copies of a gene or DNA sequence.
examples: a technique known as random amplification of polymorphic DNA
sequences were obtained from multiple amplifications from individual samples
